gemini.instruction: Analyze 'simulation/firms.py' for 'God Class' symptoms and 'Wrapper Bloat' (TD-067). Evaluate the feasibility of a Separation of Concerns (SoC) refactoring into sub-components (HR, Finance, Ops). Identify integration risks with 'tests/test_firms.py' and 'tests/test_corporate_manager.py'. Generate a Risk Audit and a draft Refactor Spec if risks are manageable.

jules.title: TD-067-Phase-A: Firm Logic Consolidation
jules.instruction: Execute TD-067 Phase A: Move financial and HR logic from 'Firm' facade into their respective sub-components in 'simulation/firms.py'. Keep wrapper properties in 'Firm' for now (Facade pattern). Focus on 'calculate_valuation' and 'get_book_value_per_share'. Verify with 'tests/test_firms.py'.

git_review.instruction: Verify that 'tests/verification/verify_mitosis.py' correctly uses Golden Fixtures and that complex inheritance logic is preserved without regression.
